snippet: Lon Snowden, Edward J. Snowden’s father, and the family’s lawyer indicated they would encourage a return to the United States, but only if acceptable trial conditions could be negotiated.
abstract: Lon Snowden, father of Edward J Snowden, and the family's lawyer say that they have obtained visas to visit the former intelligence contractor in Russia and indicate that they will encourage him to return to the United States to face federal charges, but only if acceptable trial conditions can be negotiated.
lead_paragraph: Lon Snowden, Edward J. Snowden’s father, and the family’s lawyer indicated they would encourage a return to the United States, but only if acceptable trial conditions could be negotiated.

headline.main: Leaker’s Father Says He Will Visit Son in Russia
headline.print_headline: Leaker’s Father And Lawyer Planning Visits To Russia
